title: Update Discover Filters sheet to show min/max category and Uruguay department zone

requirements.text: Replace the current single filter selector in the Discover filters sheet (the area that currently shows the “Filtrar por” label and dropdown) with three inputs shown in that same spot: (1) “Minimum category” with options 1st through 7th, (2) “Maximum category” with options 1st through 7th, and (3) “Zone” with an “All departments” option plus all Uruguay departments.

quotes: quiero que cuando el usuario toque filtros, en el mismo lugar en el que ahora aparece filtrar por, aparezca Categoria minima (de 1era a 7ma), Categoria maxima (de 1era a 7ma) y Zona (todos los departamentos de Uruguay

acceptanceCriteria: Opening the Filters sheet shows three controls (Minimum category, Maximum category, Zone) in the same location where the existing “Filtrar por” selector currently appears.
Minimum category and Maximum category each offer exactly 7 options (1st, 2nd, 3rd, 4th, 5th, 6th, 7th).
Zone offers “All departments” plus the full set of Uruguay departments (no missing entries).

requirements.text: Add a reusable, explicit list of Uruguay departments for the Zone dropdown and ensure the dropdown renders them as selectable options (keeping “All departments” as the default).
acceptanceCriteria: The Zone dropdown contains these 19 departments: Artigas, Canelones, Cerro Largo, Colonia, Durazno, Flores, Florida, Lavalleja, Maldonado, Montevideo, Paysandú, Río Negro, Rivera, Rocha, Salto, San José, Soriano, Tacuarembó, Treinta y Tres.
The default Zone selection is “All departments”.

requirements.text: Store the three filter selections in Discover screen state and pass them to the DiscoverFilters component so selections persist while opening/closing the sheet and can be changed independently.
acceptanceCriteria: Changing any of the three filter controls updates Discover screen state and the selected values remain visible when the sheet is closed and reopened.
Minimum category, Maximum category, and Zone can be set independently without UI breakage.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep the backend single-actor architecture; do not introduce new backend services.
nonGoals: Implementing actual server-side filtering logic in discoverCandidates.
Changing the Profile schema (e.g., adding a new stored category field) or expanding the existing backend Level enum.
Adding localization/i18n; only the filter UI change is in scope.
